description: The Saw Toothed Azara (Azara serrata ANDEAN GOLD) is an amazing species of plant! Its leaves have an exceedingly unique saw-tooth edge, which make up its striking appeal. In the spring, these plants produce cherry-like yellow and maroon flowers among the foliage. The Saw Toothed Azara is a low maintenance, drought-tolerant, and hardy shrub, making it a great choice for any garden. It can tolerate full exposure to the sun and prefers dry soils. Best of all, it needs little pruning to maintain its attractive appearance and can also be used as a hedge or as a single specimen in a pot. With its evergreen leaves and bright coloured blooms, the Saw Toothed Azara is perfect for anyone seeking to add an uncommonly attractive plant to their garden!
